articles.title: Longtime Southwest customer 'not sure' he'll be back after cancellations - CNN
articles.description: Southwest Airlines, the world's largest low-cost carrier, canceled more than 2,000 flights in one weekend. The company blamed the cancellations on air traffic control problems and limited staffing in Florida as well as bad weather.
